page.shortlink: api desktop api ui printers get function
page.description: UI_PRINTERS_GET() returns a list of printers installed on the current machine.

section.title: Example
section.example: ? UI_PRINTERS_GET() -> Text Driver on RTF: RTF Driver on RTF: PDF Driver on PDF: HTML Driver on HTM: HP LaserJet 6L on LPT1: Generic PostScript Printer on LPT1: Acrobat PDFWriter on LPT1: Acrobat Distiller on Ne00: Dynamic HTML Printer Driver on HTM:
